review: Good game if you are intersted in cars. A few major problems: Mouse and your accuatual movement are not set correctly.Clunky menu'sNot enough carsMaking cars is very hard due to not being able to move around freelyBut all that aside, it is in beta early release, and although i regret buying this a bit now, it is a good game and i will look forward to playing it in the future
